text:
Created attachment 26690
Screen shot of 'index of /' page

The apache displays 'index of' page instead of loading index.php. When index.php is loaded manually, it is displayed like Atom/RSS Feed.  

This does not always happen but when we load the page for first time or when we force reload it several times (Ctrl + F5). 

Temporarily I've suggested the owner to block it using .htaccess Options -Indexes. I got a forbidden page few times so htaccess is doing its job! But still the problem is apache is not loading default index page and index.php is not parsed properly! 

I am just a staff at Vlexoforums.com! The owner of the site may or may not submit the same bug again!
creator: sharuu.d@gmail.com
rpluem@apache.org
text: Bugzilla is for reporting bugs not for reporting configuration problems. Please discuss such problems on the users@httpd.apache.org mailing list.
